alert.note: Alert for Bowie (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Little River, southwestern Hempstead, northern Miller, southeastern Howard and east central Bowie Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saratoga to 8 miles east of Ashdown to near Ogden. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, Nash, Red Lick, Fulton, Ogden, Mandeville, Genoa, Mount Pleasant, McNab, Bright Star, Pleasant Hill, Millwood, Hervey, Homan, Pine Prairie and Red Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
